channel.title: Comments on: Batch Handbrake video file conversion with Python
channel.description: Intermediate in flow properties between solids and liquids; highly viscous.

item.title: By: Dan
item.dc:creator: Dan
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2014/04/11/batch-handbrake-video-file-conversion-with-python/#comment-217029">nijyokhi</a>.
Yes, if you look at the last line, 'os.remove' does a delete
item.content:encoded:
In reply to nijyokhi.

Yes, if you look at the last line, ‘os.remove’ does a delete

item.title: By: nijyokhi
item.dc:creator: nijyokhi
item.description: does this also delete the old video file
item.content:encoded: does this also delete the old video file

item.title: By: Arthur
item.dc:creator: Arthur
item.description: Thank you for the example on how to use handbrake with python. No more powershell for me and handbrake.
item.content:encoded: Thank you for the example on how to use handbrake with python. No more powershell for me and handbrake.
